title: Somebody please sell me a T206 Carolina Brights HOFer VG-VGEX!!
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Somebody please sell me a T206 Carolina Brights HOFer VG-VGEX!!
posts.post_content:
Posted By: B O'Brien
Hello all,
I am looking for a VG-VGEX Carolina Brights HOFer or Black Cap Chase.  Prefer graded.  I would love to get the Eddie Collins, but am open to any after months of searching.  This is the only back I need to finish off my basic backs line, anyone feel bad enough to let one go from your stack?  Below are the cards I already have, and would like to not duplicate poses, if at all possible.

American Beauty 350 no frame Roger Bresnahan (WB) SGC 50 
Broad Leaf 350 J. Evers (CHI on shirt) SGC 50 
Carolina Brights----------------------- 
Cycle 460 Joe Tinker (Bat on) SGC 50 
Drum Vic Willis (Batting) SGC A 
EPDG Joe Kelley SGC 50 
Hindu Christy Mathewson (Port.) SGC 20 
Lenox Walter Johnson (HAC) SGC 40 
Old Mill Hal Chase (Blue Port) SGC 40 
Piedmont 350-460 (Fact. 42) Walter Johnson (HAC) SGC 40 
Polar Bear Tris Speaker SGC 40 
Sovereign (460) Hal Chase (Trophy) PSA 4 
Sweet Cap 350-460 (42,4) John McGraw (Glove) SGC 40 
Sweet Cap 350-460 (30,2) Zack Wheat PSA 3 
Sweet Cap 350 (30,2) Hal Chase (White) SGC 40 
Sweet Cap 150 (25,2) Hal Chase (Pink) SGC 40 
Tolstoi Ty Cobb (Red Port) SGC 40 
Uzit Fred Merkle (Throwing) SGC 40 
Old Mill Southern Shag Shaughnessey PSA 5

Let me know if anyone is interested.
Thanks,
Bob
